name: Ancestors Legacy - Saladin's Conquest Digital Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Ancestors Legacy - Saladin's Conquest Digital Soundtrack

Author: Adam Skorupa and Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz

Available formats: 320kbps MP3, 1411kbps WAV

Track list:


01. Eternal Oceans of Sand
02. Hassassin's Creed
03. Holy War To Come
04. Moon Over Arabia
05. Saladin's Revenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Windows
  • Processor: Intel Atom
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics
